thread.section_title: SecurCare Self Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SecurCare Self Storage | securcareselfstorage.com | 4 of 77
thread.title: Willy
thread.title_full: SecurCare Self Storage reviewed by Willy

author: Willy
title: Willy
text:
I've shopped around for a few different storage places and have decided to store with SecurCare.
From the beginning, their customer care is outstanding. They informed me of their fair and reasonable rates, showed me the facility, and gave recommendations on a storage size. They were very accommodating to my questions and concerns and I felt I was given true and honest answers.
The facility I store with has a manager living on site, cameras galore, gated, clean and well maintained. I felt confident in storing my items there. Any doubts were soon squelched touring the facility.
Location is not too bad, right off a main road, pretty accessible and easy to get to. In addition, I felt confident there wouldn't be any weather issues affecting the facility.
5/5 Would and have recommended~
